00016     public partial class TripSpotsForm : UIForm

00018         private ServiceManager service = null;
00019 
00020         public TripSpotsForm()
00021         {
00022             InitializeComponent();
00023         }

00025         private void FormLoad(object sender, EventArgs e)
00026         {
00027             this.MenuBar.LeftMenu = "Back";
00028             this.MenuBar.LeftMenuClicked += new EventHandler(BackButtonClick);
00029             GetTripList();
00030         }
00031 
00032         private void GetTripList()
00033         {
00034             service = new ServiceManager();
00035             Trip[] trips = service.UserTrips;
00036             if (trips != null && trips.Length > 0)
00037                 DisplayTripList(trips);
00038             else
00039             {
00040                 lBoxTrips.Enabled = false;
00041                 lBoxSpots.Enabled = false;
00042             }
00043         }
00044 
00045         private void DisplayTripList(Trip[] trips)
00046         {
00047             lBoxTrips.DataSource = trips;
00048             lBoxTrips.DisplayMember = "TripName";
00049             lBoxTrips.ValueMember = "ID";
00050         }
00051 
00052         private void DisplayTripSpots(PositionNode[] spots)
00053         {
00054             lBoxSpots.DataSource = spots;
00055             lBoxSpots.DisplayMember = "Description";
00056             lBoxSpots.ValueMember = "OrdinalNumber";
00057         }
00058 
00059         private void BackButtonClick(object sender, EventArgs e)
00060         {
00061             this.DialogResult = DialogResult.Cancel;
00062             this.Close();
00063         }
00064 
00065         private void OKClick(object sender, EventArgs e)
00066         {
00067             Trip trip = lBoxTrips.SelectedItem as Trip;
00068             if (trip != null)
00069             {
00070                 TripForm tripForm = new TripForm(TripMode.CONTINUE, trip);
00071                 tripForm.ShowDialog();
00072                 this.Close();
00073             }
00074         }
00075 
00076         private void OnTripChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)
00077         {
00078             if (lBoxTrips.SelectedItem != null)
00079             {
00080                 Trip selectedTrip = (Trip)lBoxTrips.SelectedItem;
00081                 PositionNode[] nodes = service.GetPositionNodesForTrip(selectedTrip.ID);
00082                 PositionNode[] spots = nodes.Where(
00083                     node => node.Description != null && 
00084                         node.Description.Trim() != string.Empty).ToArray();
00085 
00086                 if (spots.Length > 0)
00087                 {
00088                     lBoxSpots.Enabled = true;
00089                     DisplayTripSpots(spots);
00090                 }
00091                 else
00092                 {
00093                     lBoxSpots.Enabled = false;
00094                     lBoxSpots.DataSource = null;
00095                 }
00096             }
00097         }
00098     }
